summary: “I will run away with you.”  with Sansa?
question: “I will run away with you.”  with Sansa?
answer:
“It seems as though I never get to see your bruises fully heal.”

Sansa self-consciously pulls her nightrobes over her marked skin at your comment and averts her eyes from the mirror.  She had been examining the damage herself, unaware that you were watching.

“My husband certainly sticks to his routine.”

“He’ll be back soon,” you remind her.  Ramsey has been training his hounds with the latest unfortunate victims and as the highest ranking knight outside of his own person guardsmen, you were chosen to watch over his “beloved” wife.  It was because of this position that had you gotten to know the Stark girl.  Over time, you had grown to care for her and share her bed while your lord was away.

“I’m well aware of the way our time dwindles.”

“I fear that the next time he departs, I will be alongside him.  Your brother seems to be waging a war.”

“What?” Sansa whirls around, her face paler than usual.

“I’m one of the best soldiers he has; he’d be stupid not to use me.”

“Y/N, you can’t.  You can’t go with him.  I will run away with you.”

“As enticing as the offer is, I can’t put you in danger like that.”

summary: Do you aware in Reddit, Sansa haters claimed she is just "sweet pretty" plain kind of way. Not stunningly beautiful like...
question: Do you aware in Reddit, Sansa haters claimed she is just "sweet pretty" plain kind of way. Not stunningly beautiful like Daenerys. Her prettiness is stagnant and she is not growing more pretty. Unlike Arya according to them, growing stunningly beautiful and surpassing Sansa beauty. When it comes to Sansa, they try their best to deny or undermine her. Even with things as simple as her beauty. Eventhough, there are abundance of textual evidences of Sansa beauty in the book.
answer:
this has been a thing for a long, long time. the idea that sansa is nothing special compared to fan favourites is the asoiaf fandom’s bread and butter. it’s all part of their wish to see sansa humbled and made into a chambermaid for queen daenerys/arya. it’s a sign of great insecurity because it’s not backed by canon. many, many characters comment on sansa’s very good looks. jon calls her radiant, the beautiful catelyn thinks sansa will surpass her in looks, people are constantly falling for her sometimes creepily (littlefinger and sandor), sometimes not so creepily (robert arryn, harry the heir). most importantly while people doubt her intelligence, loyalty and worth, the one thing they don’t disparage is her face (which depresses me).

daenerys is beautiful. arya’s going to grow up to be unconventionally good looking like lyanna stark. sansa is beautiful. all of these things are canon.

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary: What about some Sansa and Margaery modern au? Btw do you ship Sansaery??
question: What about some Sansa and Margaery modern au? Btw do you ship Sansaery??
answer:
I used to ship Sansaery a lot but for a while now I haven’t been feeling any of the Sansa ships…just kind of like my girl on her own rn. I’m mostly indifferent anymore.

  • They meet at university- Margaery in an poli-sci path and Sansa in a business major. Jeyne Poole introduces them and the three of them get along really well. It gets a bit complicated when feelings get introduces but when Sansa brings it up with Jeyne she just grins and says, “Don’t worry about it. I could see it a mile away”
  • Both are romantics at heart and they try and go through all the romantic date ideas they’ve had since they were teenagers. They were fun and beautiful, but if they are being awesome, the nights they spend in cooking dinner and listening to podcasts together are just as good, if not slightly better. 
  • They go out a lot. They are just on of those couples that like exploring the city they live in a lot. They like being tourist in their own city. Both of them are pretty social to so they always bring the other as a plus 1 to events.
  • Sansa edits all of Margaery’s papers sitting in their arm chair in her pajamas with her little reading classes on. Its really cute.
  • Moving in together is a bit of a hassle. Between all their belongs and knickknacks, they have too many things and end up having to donate some of their things. Both of them get hung up on their books. Even if they have the same copy, neither of them can bare to part with them and so their bookshelf has sometimes double versions of the same books/series.

tags: i get that sansa is a great character but that doesn't mean she's compatible with everyone
summary: What do you think of the Sansa ships Sandry (Gendry x Sansa) and Jaimsa (Jaime x Sansa)?
question: What do you think of the Sansa ships Sandry (Gendry x Sansa) and Jaimsa (Jaime x Sansa)?
answer:
I already talked about Jaime and Sansa here. As for Gendry/Sansa, I don’t get the appeal. He is really boring, doesn’t know anything about Sansa and he’ll likely remain in the South while Sansa is going North with an army after being declared Queen by the Vale lords (in the books). In the show, Sansa’s got her own thing going, hasn’t shown interest in any man after Ramsay, would have no reason to strike up a friendship or relationship with this dude unless it’s a post war scenario and since he is Robert’s bastard son, maybe (and this is really stretching it) he could be King and since she knows about ruling she could give him advice. Like that’s the most that could ever happen. 

I personally don’t think Gendry/Arya is going to happen (she’s 11 and he’s 17-18) but it has way more chance of being canon compared to Gendry/Sansa.

summary: Whenever I see fans questioning Sansa’s Starkness I just remember she is the one who said some of the most important lines from...
body:
Whenever I see fans questioning Sansa’s Starkness I just remember she is the one who said some of the most important lines from House Stark.

Throughout the entire series and when we first meet the Starks we hear “Winter is Coming.” It’s their reminder and moto in life and Sansa was the Stark to look at Jon on top the battlements of her father’s castle and say “Winter is Here.”

Then in season 7, at the same place after the execution of one of the biggest villains of the show Sansa and Arya stand on top the battlements and Sansa says “When the snows fall and the white winds blow, the lone wolf dies. But the pack survives.” This is the same thing Ned said in the books and is a crucial part in the way not just the Starks, but the North believe in sticking together to survive and Sansa was the one to utter these words.

Sansa is and always has been a Stark at heart. And now more than ever her family and her pack means everything to her. Don’t ever try and tell me she would betray them or not do what’s best for the North.

summary: Arya, to Sansa: These five people all need organ transplants or they will die. Lord Baelish is perfectly healthy. Sansa, do you...
body:
Arya, to Sansa: These five people all need organ transplants or they will die. Lord Baelish is perfectly healthy. Sansa, do you want to slice him open and use his organs to save the five sick people?

Littlefinger, panicking: Sansa, Sansa think about this. I’m your hottest fri-no, Margaery. I’m your nicest frien- no, brienne. I’m your friend!

blog.name: kellyvela
blog.title: IF I CAN DREAM…
blog.description: Waiting for The Winds of Winter to read the real Jon Snow written by GRRM

title: Jon Snow Song in Season 8
body:
Some truths, over time, can learn to play nice.
Some truths are sharper than knives.
Some truths we only see in the corners of our eyes.
Some truths we wish we could hide.

Some truths can save us,
Some take our lives.
Some truths are fire
And some truths are ice.

No matter what category you fit into,
Truth’s got its sight set on you.

If truth is north
Then I am true south.
I can’t figure it out-
God knows.
Always looking up
’Til my eyes give up.
That’s how I lost touch
Of who I am and who I was.

Some truths were sewn into our DNA.
Some truths unravel and fray.
Some truths keep growing taller than giants.
Some truths take our breath away.
Some truths get tired
The longer we wait.
Well, some truths get tired
The longer we wait.

If truth is north
Then I am true south.
I can’t figure it out-
God knows
I’m always looking up
’Til my eyes give up.
That’s how I lost touch
Of who I was.
If truth is north
Then I am true south.
I can’t figure it out-
God knows I’ve tried
Always looking up
’Til my eyes give up.
That’s how I lost touch
Of who I am and who I was.

Some truths are gentle, forgiving and kind.
Some truths are hard to define.
Some truths are crooked, with rough edges too,
But some truths wear like comfortable shoes.

Some truths are loyal
As the shadows we lead.
Some truths are stubborn as gravity.

No matter what category you fit into,
Truth’s got its sight set on you.

“South” - Sleeping At Last 

Truth’s got its sight set on you:

reblog.comment:
Some truths, over time, can learn to play nice.
Some truths are sharper than knives.
Some truths we only see in the corners of our eyes.
Some truths we wish we could hide.

Some truths can save us,
Some take our lives.
Some truths are fire
And some truths are ice.

No matter what category you fit into,
Truth’s got its sight set on you.

If truth is north
Then I am true south.
I can’t figure it out-
God knows.
Always looking up
’Til my eyes give up.
That’s how I lost touch
Of who I am and who I was.

Some truths were sewn into our DNA.
Some truths unravel and fray.
Some truths keep growing taller than giants.
Some truths take our breath away.
Some truths get tired
The longer we wait.
Well, some truths get tired
The longer we wait.

Then I am true south.

God knows

’Til my eyes give up.
That’s how I lost touch
Of who I was.

title: Sansa on Westeros.org
body:
Hello everyone… so I saw this a couple of months ago, lost the link and finally found it again. It is an interesting series on Sansa Stark and her evolution throughout the series. I am leaving a link to the first ever forum thread. Hope you guys enjoy. There are a lot of threads with this same title (latest was PtP Sansa 19).

https://asoiaf.westeros.org/index.php?/topic/60985-from-pawn-to-player-rereading-sansa/

but where do you guys get this stuff
summary: Scrolling through the Game of Thrones Ao3 is just wild, cause you see your fair share of common pairings but every once and...
body: Scrolling through the Game of Thrones Ao3 is just wild, cause you see your fair share of common pairings but every once and awhile, this weird, out there, very wrong pairing just hits you in the face. What I’m saying is, you all need to stop shipping Sansa with everything that breathes.

reblog.comment: Scrolling through the Game of Thrones Ao3 is just wild, cause you see your fair share of common pairings but every once and awhile, this weird, out there, very wrong pairing just hits you in the face. What I’m saying is, you all need to stop shipping Sansa with everything that breathes.

What I’m saying is, you all need to stop shipping Sansa with everything that breathes.

tags: as crônicas de gelo e fogo
summary: A cidade inteira tinha medo. Sansa podia vê-lo das muralhas do castelo. As pessoas comuns se escondiam atrás de venezianas...
text: A cidade inteira tinha medo. Sansa podia vê-lo das muralhas do castelo. As pessoas comuns se escondiam atrás de venezianas fechadas e portas trancadas, como se isso as mantivesse salvo. Da última vez que Porto Real caíra, os Lannister tinham saqueado e violado as mulheres a seu bel-prazer, e tinham passado centenas na espada, apesar de a cidade ter aberto os portões. Daquela vez, o Duende pretendia lutar, e uma cidade que lutava não podia esperar qualquer tipo de misericórdia.
source: George R.R Martin - A Fúria dos Reis

reblog.comment: George R.R Martin - A Fúria dos Reis
